user.title: Connect to Hydrolix
user.description: Enter your Hydrolix cluster connection details. The integration will use the Config API to discover and provision resources.

data_description.hydrolix_host: Hostname of your Hydrolix cluster (e.g., my-cluster.hydrolix.live)
data_description.hydrolix_token: Bearer token for authentication (must have config + ingest permissions)

project.title: Select or Create a Project
project.description: A Hydrolix project is a container for tables. Choose an existing project or create a new one for your Home Assistant data.

data_description.project_mode: Use an existing project or create a new one
data_description.project_new_name: Name for the new project (used in SQL queries as the database name)

table.title: Select or Create a Table
table.description: Choose an existing table in project "{project_name}" or create a new one. The write transform for Home Assistant state data will be configured automatically.

data_description.table_mode: Use an existing table or create a new one
data_description.table_new_name: Name for the new table (used in SQL queries)

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the Hydrolix Config API. Check the hostname, token, and that your IP is allowlisted.
error.project_error: Failed to list or create the project. Check your token has project-level permissions.
error.table_error: Failed to create the table or transform. Check your token has admin or publisher permissions.

abort.already_configured: This Hydrolix project + table combination is already configured.

init.title: Hydrolix History Options
init.description: Configure batching and entity filtering. Use comma-separated values for domain and entity lists.

data_description.batch_size: Number of events to send per batch (1–10000)
data_description.batch_interval: How often to flush the event queue in seconds (1–300)
data_description.include_domains: Only record these domains (comma-separated, e.g., sensor, climate)
data_description.exclude_domains: Never record these domains (comma-separated, e.g., automation, script)
